meaningMnemonic: We try to <kanji>preserve</kanji> anything we want to <kanji>exist</kanji> with <vocabulary>preservation</vocabulary>. Want a special sea creature or bird to exist? Up <vocabulary>conservation</vocabulary> efforts! And, if you want to save data (like on a computer), you can use this word for that kind of <vocabulary>saving</vocabulary>, as well.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
